entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `created` INTEGER NOT NULL, `oauth_key` TEXT NOT NULL, `display_name` TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE)

indices.name: index_user_oauth_key
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_user_oauth_key` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`oauth_key`)

indices.name: index_user_display_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_user_display_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`display_name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pattern_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `created` INTEGER NOT NULL, `modified` INTEGER NOT NULL, `user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`user_id`) REFERENCES `user`(`user_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_pattern_pattern_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_pattern_pattern_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`pattern_id`)

indices.name: index_pattern_created
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_pattern_created` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`created`)

indices.name: index_pattern_modified
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_pattern_modified` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`modified`)

indices.name: index_pattern_user_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_pattern_user_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id`)
